records.where_clear: A village in Greece within the operational area of JO Greece 2024 Land.

possible_violations.violation_name: Violation of Code of Conduct applicable to all persons participating in Frontex operational activities

records.context_note: Irresponsible use of a Transportation Vehicle by SC officers to travel outside their place of duty. Two SC officers left their working place for approx. 2 hours, visited a village in a Frontex provided vehicle, were spotted by a Frontex patrol, and their presence was not justified. They did not duly inform about their absence.
records.evidence_quote: Irresponsible use of a Transportation Vehicle by SC officers to travel outside their place of duty
